promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic mythical chameleon water-type holding a blue crystal lance. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquasauron, a gigantic mythical chameleon water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Ice Blast, Sonic Evil. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word chameleon or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, chameleon-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Aquasauron glides thru rivers, freezing foes with its icy breath. Evil roars shake the waters, and its tails acrobatically dance.
